name: Modernizing a classic
description:
Blast asteroids and saucers to achieve the highest score and modernize the game.

The game modernizes the old 70's Asteroids arcade game, taking it from its origins to a modern-day game.

Controls:

'A' & 'D' Rotate left, rotate right, ';' & '#' Thrust, fire, and [SPACE] Hyperspace.

Use the above controls for an authentic arcade feel. Keys are roughly positioned the same way as the original arcade machine. For a modern feel use the controls below.

'W' 'A' 'D for Thrust, rotate left, rotate right. {LEFT] Mouse = Fire, [RIGHT] Mouse = hyperspace.

New life every 10,000 points, new modernization every 4,500 points from VFX & music improvements to a new 3D ship and asteroids.

Watch out for the small saucer that appears after 10,000 points, it has a great aim!

Comments and suggestions are very much welcomed.
